properties.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 5:44AM PST until January 18 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected, changing to freezing rain sometime
Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice
accumulations of around two tenths of an inch.

* WHERE...Central Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 2 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the
snow and ice. Major travel impacts are expected.
properties.instruction:
Significant amounts of snow and ice are forecast that will make
travel dangerous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight,
food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM PST SATURDAY
